page.title: 08Churches in Ayr.
page.content: There are almost 30{churches}in Ayr. Half are Church of Scotland; the rest are non_conformist, Episcopal or Roman Catholic. Three town centre churches of Scotland closed recently. There are no ethnic minority churches locally. Most churches have group activities for adults and young people. There are many Sunday Schools and{Youth Organisations}(Scouts, Boys' Brigade, Crusaders); 3000 Guides in Ayr Presbtery celebrate their 75th Anniversary this year. Most schools have chaplains and R.C. schools have close links with church and priests. Catholics and Protestants are friendly. The Church of Scotland publishes its own monthly magazine called "Ayrway" and has its own Bookshop. {Local Radio}(West Sound) involves most local churches in its{religious programmes.
